mainSequence.step: User initiates a request to change the marketing campaign.
Marketing Platform sends a message to Retail Marketing Platform.
Retail Marketing Platform processes the type of marketing campaign change (add, invalidate, delete, edit).
Retail Marketing Platform synchronously/asynchronously sends a message to the Channel.
Channel processes the message and returns a response.
Retail Marketing Platform sends a response back to the Marketing Platform.
Marketing Platform sends a response back to the User.
